SELECT ACCIDENT_KIND_ID, ACCIDENT_KIND_NAME,
DELETE_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_MS_USER_ID, UPDATE_MS_USER_ID
FROM MS_ACCIDENT_KIND
WHERE DELETE_FLAG = False
INSERT INTO MS_ACCIDENT_KIND( ACCIDENT_KIND_NAME , DELETE_FLAG , UPDATE_MS_USER_ID , CREATE_MS_USER_ID ) VALUES( :ACCIDENT_KIND_NAME , :DELETE_FLAG , :UPDATE_MS_USER_ID , :CREATE_MS_USER_ID )

UPDATE MS_ACCIDENT_KIND SET ACCIDENT_KIND_NAME = :ACCIDENT_KIND_NAME , DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , UPDATE_MS_USER_ID = :UPDATE_MS_USER_ID
WHERE ACCIDENT_KIND_ID = :ACCIDENT_KIND_ID
